note.p: Author and translator. Translated works from French. Wrote on positivism. Secretary of the Commercial Travellers’ Benevolent Institution, 1867.
Census returns of England and Wales 1871 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG10/1335/92/18)
Sampson Low, Charities of London (London: Sampson Low, Son and Marston, 1867)
